data.eml:eml: Three new species of Lyssomanes HENTZ, 1845 from Peru (Arachnida: Araneae: Salticidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Logunov, Dmitri V. (2000): Three new species of Lyssomanes HENTZ, 1845 from Peru (Arachnida: Araneae: Salticidae). Reichenbachia Staatliches Museum für Tierkunde Dresden 33: 267-270
